Package dev.efekos.classes.api.i

Interface IPerk

public interface IPerk
Main interface of PerkRegistry.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    degrade(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
    Removes all the effects that grant(Player, int) did on the player given.
    String

  • Method Details

    • grant

      void grant(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, int level)
      Grants this perk to someone. Classes will call this method everytime player levels up, and when the player joins a class that contains this perk. This method doesn't have to handle the entire perk itself. You can put the players with this perk to somewhere, then use that data to make this perk properly work.
      Parameters:
      player - Player that is in a class with this perk.
      level - Class level of the player in that class.
      Since:
      1.0

    • degrade

      void degrade(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Removes all the effects that grant(Player, int) did on the player given. Classes will call this method when the player leaves his class.
      Parameters:
      player - Player that just leaved his class.
      Since:
      1.0

    • getDescription

      String getDescription(int level)
      Returns a description about this perk, that must follow the rules below.
      • Description must be yellow (ChatColor.YELLOW) by default.
      This description doesn't have to be a static description, or just a string. I can be changed using the level parameter.
      Parameters:
      level - Class level of the player that will see this. If player is not in the class that contains this modifier, then 0.
      Returns:
      A description for this perk.
      Since:
      1.0
